ygData.subject: Re: Carillion song (was  Bard only equipment, a rant)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not exactly.  I use it fairly often to get better prices from merchants and occasionally to get a quest. You target a single non-player, but the effect
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:01 AM 9/17/99 -1000, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
>Its been so long
>since we discussed this song on the list, I've forgotten how it works.
>IIRC, it only works on one target and wears off very quickly.

Not exactly. I use it fairly often to get better prices from merchants and
occasionally to get a quest.

You target a single non-player, but the effect actually applies to you. It
raises your faction with all non-players of the targets faction. The
target glows to indicate that's the faction you got upped.

As far as I've observed the effect lasts until you zone or log out.

Thrush, stuck at 16 1/2 on Veeshan
